description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Enter a description for your community

errors.required: Tell us which city your community operates in

email_template_from.label: Notification reply email
email_template_from.hint: This email is used as the default sender of notifications.

errors.format: Response email out of standard format

mailchimp_api_key.label: Mailchimp API Key
mailchimp_api_key.placeholder: Enter here the content of "API key"

help.title: Where to get this information?
help.step1: After logging in as administrator in mailchimp, click on your username. A menu will appear, click the {accountStrong} option.
help.step3: Now just paste the contents of {apiKeyStrong} into the field below.

help.title: Where to get this information?
help.step1: After logging in as administrator in mailchimp, click on your username. A menu will appear, click the {listStrong} option.
help.step2: Select the corresponding list and follow the steps: {settingsStrong}> {listAndDefaultsStrong}
help.step3: Now just paste in the field below the contents of the right column below the title {listIdStrong}

help.title: Where to get this information?
help.step1: Click {strongPhoneNumber} ({strongHashtag} symbol in the left menu)
help.step2: Choose which number Twilio wants to use
